statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'login' AND wallet_id = 500;
DELETE FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE user_id = 100 AND behavior_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE prediction_result = 'High Risk' AND transaction_amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'login' AND behavior_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_wallet_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'Suspicious Activity';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0 OR last_updated < '2021-09-01';
